variations.description: Attacks the enemy in the back row twice, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 48% of ATK. If Inn is the executor, deals 20% more Physical DMG; if Lou is the executor, reduces the target's Crit DMG Resistance by 5% for 10s. Can stack up to 50%.

Attacks the enemy in the back row twice, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 56% of ATK. If Inn is the executor, deals 20% more Physical DMG; if Lou is the executor, reduces the target's Crit DMG Resistance by 5% for 10s. Can stack up to 50%.

Attacks the enemy in the back row twice, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 64% of ATK. If Inn is the executor, deals 20% more Physical DMG; if Lou is the executor, reduces the target's Crit DMG Resistance by 5% for 10s. Can stack up to 50%.

Attacks the enemy in the back row twice, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 72% of ATK. If Inn is the executor, deals 20% more Physical DMG; if Lou is the executor, reduces the target's Crit DMG Resistance by 5% for 10s. Can stack up to 50%.

Attacks the enemy in the back row twice, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 80% of ATK. If Inn is the executor, deals 20% more Physical DMG; if Lou is the executor, reduces the target's Crit DMG Resistance by 5% for 10s. Can stack up to 50%.

Attacks the enemy in the back row 6 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 60% of ATK. Also places Pain on the target for 6s. Pain: Deals Physical DMG equal to 30% of Inn & Lou's ATK per second.

Attacks the enemy in the back row 6 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 70% of ATK. Also places Pain on the target for 6s. Pain: Deals Physical DMG equal to 35% of Inn & Lou's ATK per second.

Attacks the enemy in the back row 6 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 80% of ATK. Also places Pain on the target for 6s. Pain: Deals Physical DMG equal to 40% of Inn & Lou's ATK per second.

Attacks the enemy in the back row 6 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 90% of ATK. Also places Pain on the target for 6s. Pain: Deals Physical DMG equal to 45% of Inn & Lou's ATK per second.

Attacks the enemy in the back row 6 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 100% of ATK. Also places Pain on the target for 6s. Pain: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50% of Inn & Lou's ATK per second.
Increases damage dealt by 5% every 20 seconds. Can stack up to 25%.
Increases damage dealt by 10% every 20 seconds. Can stack up to 50%.
